sentences.en: A dense column of smoke rose several miles into the air.
sentences.cn: 一股浓烟升到了几英里的高空。

sentences.en: Add up the figures in this column.
sentences.cn: 把这一栏的数字合计一下.

sentences.en: After a short march, the column entered the village.
sentences.cn: 短途行军后，队伍进了村。

sentences.en: Alert readers may have noticed the misprint in last week's column.
sentences.cn: 细心的读者可能已经注意到上周专栏中的印刷错误了.

sentences.en: He writes a weekly column for ‘The Times’.
sentences.cn: 他每周为《泰晤士报》写一篇专栏文章。

sentences.en: His column is syndicated throughout the world.
sentences.cn: 他的专栏文章在世界各地的报刊发表。

sentences.en: I ghosted his weekly rugby column for the Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 我为他代写《电讯报》每周的橄榄球专栏。

sentences.en: I often read his column in the local paper.
sentences.cn: 我经常在当地的报纸上看到他的专栏文章.

sentences.en: Reviews are distilled from articles previously published in the main column.
sentences.cn: 述评是从先前刊登在主要专栏的文章中提炼出来的。

sentences.en: Rule off the column and we'll close the account at that date.
sentences.cn: 画线把那栏隔开,我们将按那个日期结账.

sentences.en: Seven massive columns rise up from a marble floor.
sentences.cn: 七根巨大的圆柱从大理石地面拔地而起。

sentences.en: She angled her column of chitchat toward teenagers.
sentences.cn: 她的漫谈栏侧重于十几岁的青少年.

sentences.en: Subheads should be placed in the middle of the column.
The overdrive switch was on the steering column.
sentences.cn: 超速挡的开关在转向杆上。

sentences.en: This column is ten years old today.
sentences.cn: 这个专栏到今天已经开办10年了。

sentences.en: We had stupidly been looking at the wrong column of figures.
sentences.cn: 我们稀里糊涂，看串了数字栏。

sentences.en: Word went out that a column of tanks was on its way.
sentences.cn: 有消息说一队坦克已经出动了。

trans.tran_cn: 专栏，队，纵行，纪念柱，柱状物
trans.tran_en: an article on a particular subject or by a particular writer that appears regularly in a newspaper or magazine
